MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L20 Bootle area of Liverpool affecting properties in Thornton Avenue, Mount Road, Church Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:51am. Our engineers have arrived at Church Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:47am on 26th October 2020
